Reviews.Title: Used Gift Sooooo Dissapointed
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my Dad as gift,so that we can stay in touch with BBM.  So when he called, I thought he was going to be so excited about the surprise I got for him, so Imagine how disappointed I was to hear him say that the phone looks like it have been used and has been dropped because it had huge digs and marks on the keyboard as well as the tackle box looks like it been used for a while, and the description of the phone says NEW!!!! but this phone has clearly been used!I am totally disappointed and this is the 3rd unpleasant incident with ordering items on Amazon, I feel like I fail my Dad!

Reviews.Title: BEST BLACKBERRY TO DATE
Reviews.Author: Antonio Good
Reviews.Content: Awesome phone! Best of both worlds w/the touch screen and keypad. Fast OS 7.1 multi-task type of phone for business as well as pleasure. Very fast and plenty features. Recommend purchasing this phone.

Reviews.Title: Email and typing.... the best
Reviews.Author: Frankismz "Frankismz"
Reviews.Content: But as a smartphone the lack of apps and support for those apps which are already available, it's not great.For emails and typing, none can beat this. The screen is small for today's apps (google maps is infuriatingly small).Not sure how long BB will last.

Reviews.Title: Love the looks
Reviews.Author: katherine by
Reviews.Content: Came just as described. At first, it did not turn on after I inserted the battery and I emailed the buyer-using some not so nice choice words. Then I let it rest for a while and reinserted battery and it worked. The four star instead of five is that it freezes a lot but not for long. Also, other users have complained of this. This is a bb problem not the customer.

Reviews.Title: Good BUT not great
Reviews.Author: Cecly Ann Mitchell
Reviews.Content: I bought this device to replace my 9700 Bold which was giving a lot of trouble. The device worked beautifully out of the box BUT I also own a BlackBerry Playbook and to date I cannot get this device to bridge with my PlayBook to enable me to read my emails on my PlayBook. I was told that AT&T; which is branded into this device has blocked the ability to Bridge with the PlayBook. I am so frustrated and disappointed with this device. Additionally if the native browser is opened the device overheats and the battery drains.
